item.title: Simplify cleanup operations
item.description: Developers often have difficulties to perform proper clean up and our instructions contain many steps. We should examine the option of providing a more simplified way for handling this. Less grouped methods could suffice (with the needed internal checks).

item.comment: Developers often have difficulties to perform proper clean up and our instructions contain many steps. We should examine the option of providing a more simplified way for handling this. Less grouped methods could suffice (with the needed internal checks).

I stumbled over the problem that using the destroyAll() method requires overriding the destroyMapViews() method in the MapViewerTemplate, as otherwise a double destroy of the FramebufferController will cause a crash.
I think this is somewhat undesirable.
